poem:
Title: "A Premise Shadowed in Controversy"

Under the tattered banner of leadership,
Netanyahu, a lone gull in the squall.
Haunted by the ghosts of October,
Gaza's echoes resonate in the hospital walls.
Voices of opposition, woven in shadows,
Echo the drama of one man's fall.

A frail body, a mighty man fights,
The battleground now lies within.
Surgery's quiet theater, a conflicted stage,
Reminding us, even leaders are merely men.
